Package com.kuleuven.swop.group17.RobotGameWorld.applicationLayer

Class RobotGameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuleuven.swop.group17.RobotGameWorld.applicationLayer.RobotGameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.kuleuven.swop.group17.GameWorldApi.GameWorld
    public class RobotGameWorld
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.kuleuven.swop.group17.GameWorldApi.GameWorld
    A GameWorld is described by a GameWorldType. GameWorlds are able to perform Actions, evaluate predicates, save and restore their state and draw themselves on a given graphics object.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    group17
